All Classes

Class Description
Coordinates
Coordinate class which is used to define position on the game map
Direction
Is used for multiple purposes such as managing direction input from the user and the monster AI.
Entity
Abstract Entity class parent of Hero and Monster, serves as a basis for all entities.
Handler
Sets up text menu and gameplay environment.
Hero
Hero class that is the player with fields kill count and powerCount.
Level
The game map where all gameplay will take place.
Main
The Main method where in which the game is initialized.
Monster
Monster class which inherits its fields from Entity.
Power
Power class which inherits its fields from the Entity class.
Terrain
Terrain class which is used to determine whether a Tile object is Empty or if it is a wall.
Tile
Stores information in regards to what an individual tile holds (Monster,Hero,empty,wall) Is used to create and later on manage the Level while playing the game.
UserInterface
Initializes the UI and manages user input in relation to the game and the various mechanics of the Objects that it uses.
Utility
Hosts a number of independent utility methods that streamlines in-game logic.
